trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipula o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> evento ocorre somente quando você chama o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event, and deserializes an object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, adiciona um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> evento e desserializa um objeto.
